GapFillDragDrop.ContentGapFillDragDrop: When I was a child, my mother and father didn'thave a lot of money - we certainly weren'trich. We didn't owna big house - in fact it was very small. I didn't havea bedroom just for me - my two big sisters and I lived in the same room. I didn't likethat - it was horrible. My father was always ill and he didn't worka lot - he never stayed in a job for long because he didn't gointo the office when he was ill. My mother worked for a few hours every week in a small shop, but she didn't makemuch money from that. Some people say that money doesn't bring happiness, but my family wasn'thappy. When I was 18, I didn't wantto stay with my family any more, so I decided to move out.
